dokku.predeploy: php bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate --allow-no-migration && php bin/console doctrine:fixtures:load --no-interaction
dokku.postdeploy: php bin/console cache:clear --env=prod && php bin/console cache:warmup --env=prod && php bin/console app:updateplayers && php bin/console app:syncfranchisedata && php bin/console app:synctradebaitdata
